General.Name: Jiangxi Synergy Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Synergy Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells APIs worldwide. It offers raw materials, pharmaceutical intermediates, and fine chemicals. Jiangxi Synergy Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Yichun, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Jiangxi Fengxin Industrial Park, Yichun, China, 330700
